title: $:/plugins/ajh/favorites
author: Andrew

{ "tiddlers": { "$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Caption": { "text": "favorite", "title": "$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Caption" }, "$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Hint": { "text": "Add to favorites list", "title": "$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Hint" }, "$:/language/SideBar/Favorites/Caption": { "text": "Favorites", "title": "$:/language/SideBar/Favorites/Caption" }, "$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/icon": { "text": "\define my-svg() \end <$vars m='96,122' path={{$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/image!!path}}> <> ", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/icon", "tags": "$:/tags/Image" }, "$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/readme": { "text": "This plugin adds the {{$:/core/images/star-filled}} favorites button to the View Toolbar and also the {{$:/core/images/star-filled}} tab to the Sidebar. The favorites button turns yellow {{$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/image}} when selected and then the tiddler appears in the list on the {{$:/core/images/star-filled}} tab. The list can be sorted using drag and drop. To drag an item, select it, then hold down the mouse or trackpad button while you drag it to a new location in the list. Release the button to drop the item into place. Unneeded favorites can be removed from the list by using the {{$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/image}} favorites button in the tiddler. Simply drag $:/plugins/ajh/favorites to the top of your tiddlywiki display, save and reload. This plugin comprises: * Template * Sidebar tab", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/readme" }, "$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/SideBar": { "text": "\define drop-actions() <$action-listops $tiddler='$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/list' $subfilter='+[insertbefore:currentTiddler]'/> \end <$list filter='[list[$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/list]]'>
<$droppable actions=<>>
 
<$link to={{!!title}}> <$view field='caption'><$view field='title'/>
", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/SideBar", "tags": "$:/tags/SideBar", "list-before": "", "caption": "{{$:/core/images/star-filled}}{{$:/language/SideBar/Favorites/Caption}}" }, "$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/template": { "text": "\define add() [[$(currentTiddler)$]] \define remove() -[[$(currentTiddler)$]] <$list filter='[list[$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/list]is[current]]'><$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Caption}} class=<>> <$action-listops $tiddler='$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/list' $field='list' $subfilter=<>/> <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'> {{$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/image}} <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Caption}}/> <$list filter='[all[current]!list[$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/list]]'><$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Caption}} class=<>> <$action-listops $tiddler='$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/list' $field='list' $subfilter=<>/> <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'> {{$:/core/images/star-filled}} <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Caption}}/> ", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/template", "tags": "$:/tags/ViewToolbar", "list-after": "$:/core/ui/Buttons/more-tiddler-actions", "description": "{{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Hint}}", "caption": "{{ $:/core/images/star-filled}} {{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Caption}}" }, "$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/stylesheet": { "text": ".tc-btn-dropdown + .tc-favorites-hidden { display: none;
